basics.name: Shahjalal
basics.label: Software Engineer(Backend & Frontend)
basics.summary: i am focusing on full-stack web application development with backend technologies like PHP (Laravel, CakePHP, CI, or other php Framework  ) and Ruby on Rails, and frontend frameworks such as React, Angular, and Next.js and i have little experience in Inertia.js. In Additionally i have have hands-on experience in DevOps and clouds. In DevOps (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, gitlab CI/CD) and like AWS (EC2, Load Balancer, S3, Route 53, RDS, or other as application demands) and DigitalOcean.
basics.objective: Eager to expand my skill set through external trainings to help boost all major front desk KPIs. Hoping to leverage organizational skills to help ABC Corp introduce time-saving schemes for all executives.

work.name: Reivo Bangladesh
highlights: * Worked on a team of 3 developers to develop a web application for a client
work.summary:
• Develop web applications based PHP (Laravel, CakePHP, CI, or other php Framework ) and Ruby on Rails, and frontend frameworks such as React, Angular, and Next.js as per client demands
  • As for company needs works on DevOps and clouds. In DevOps (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, gitlab CI/CD) and like AWS (EC2, Load Balancer, S3, Route 53, RDS, or other as application demands) and DigitalOcean.
  • Use my extensive experience with front end development to define the structure and components for the project, making sure they are reusable
  • Keep the code quality high reviewing code from other developers and suggesting improvements
  • Interact with the designer to suggest changes and to make sure the view he has about the design is translated into actual functionality

work.name: Arobil Ltd.
highlights: * Worked on a team of 10 developers to develop a web application for a client
work.summary:
• Develop web applications based on Php(Cakephp, CI), Angular 8 and Centose server
  • Develop Email server(postfix Devcot with roundcoube) for client
  • VPS server(own machine) configuration and optimization for E-commerce(Apache & Nginx)
  • Lead a Intern Team of 2 front end developers, giving support to the client's multi-cultural team, providing feedback, clarifying requirements and helping with technical questions
  • Keep the Project Manager and the IT Leads updated on the overall progress of the projects and manage the tasks distributed to the team
  • Keep the code and the features implemented by the other developers in accordance to the requirements
